title: dd_meta_index_set: fd=1024 is not less then limit max_ifd=1024 or negative. Execution aborted.
body:
Hi,

When starting the static 1.2.4 linux binary file we're seeing:
murmur.x86-1.2.4: fd_meta_index_set: fd=1024 is not less then limit max_ifd=1024 or negative. Execution aborted.

We have a lot of virtual servers so we're expecting to need a lot of file descriptors.

Thanks!


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1034/ .
